document_data.mainbody:
The Green Goddess Falls were a series of waterfalls in Amn.
The Falls were part of the River Rimril, as its waters flowed out of the Troll Mountains. The largest of the falls was  in height and poured over the cliffs on the west side of Eldaths Mount and into Duskwood Dell. Afterward, the waters continued cascading in a number of smaller falls and pools called the Steps.
